projects.name: Rubbish Radar
projects.desc: Rubbish Radar is an app designed to help netizens find public waste bins. It displays 3 different types: combustible, recyclable, and landfill. A future version includes public facilities.

feature_1.name: Vue.js
feature_1.desc: Renders front-end content with the Vue.js framework, SPA application.

feature_2.name: Firebase
feature_2.desc: Stors geolocation marker documents, and handles user authentication.

feature_3.name: GCP
feature_3.desc: Integrats Google Maps API, interactive UI/UX to navigate to markers.

projects.name: Budget Buddy
projects.desc: Budget Buddy is a MERN stack application for users to track their personal finances. It facilitates React Google Charts to display user spending habits. Authentication is handled with JWT.

feature_1.name: React
feature_1.desc: React is the front-end framework used to query user's financial auditing info.

feature_2.name: MongoDB
feature_2.desc: MongoDB is the NoSQL document-oriented database program used to store data.

feature_3.name: Vercel
feature_3.desc: Vercel is the cloud platform used to deploy and manage the front-end layer of Budget Buddy.
